column4: After upgrading to Ocelot, I just can't get used to the new Unity or Gnome 3. I've tried using the Gnome Classic but even that annoys me. If I switch to KDE, how will most of the progs I'm used to running (Rhythmbox, Libre Office, Firefox, etc.) be affected, if at all?

ai9371m s0nee, I think the interface is appealing, but the interaction isn't working well with me. I'm used to Alt+Tab switching between all open windows, not programs. I hate that if I have two terminals open to switch between them I have to Alt+Tab to the terminal, wait for it to show the others, then switch.
And I hate that I don't have my panel applets anymore! Can't see processor temp, usage, networking usage, and no weather applet!
true that..the alt+tab is useful but not full featured
